original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Score<=40 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-28 17:40:56' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 04:22:44' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.LinkTypeId=1
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 40 AND posts.CommentCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-28 17:40:56' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 04:22:44')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E6.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4E7 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1E2E6E4.UserId=E7.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4E7E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6E4E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E6E4E7.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4E7E5E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E6E4E7E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E6E4E7E5.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
